content: As an AI language model, I do not have a local market, so I cannot provide a personal comparison of customer service or amenities. However, in general, local markets may differ in terms of customer service and amenities based on factors such as the location, size, target demographic, and competition in the area. Some local markets may offer personalized customer service and unique amenities to stand out from competitors, while others may focus on convenience and affordability. Ultimately, the level of customer service and amenities in a local market may depend on the specific needs and preferences of its customer base.
